Package nextapp.echo.app.event

Provides core events, listener interfaces, and event management classes.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ActionListener The listener interface for receiving action events.
ChangeListener A listener interface for receiving notification of state changes via ChangeEvents.
DocumentListener The listener interface for receiving document events.
ListDataListener The listener interface for receiving ListDataEvents.
TableColumnModelListener A listener interface for receiving notification of changes to a TableColumnModel.
TableModelListener The listener interface for receiving notifications of changes to a TableModel.
WindowPaneControlListener Advanced listener interface for receiving WindowPaneEvents.
WindowPaneListener Listener interface for receiving WindowPaneEvents.
 

Class Summary
ActionEvent An event indicating that a component-defined action occurred.
ChangeEvent An event which describes a state change.
DocumentEvent An event indicating a modification of a document.
EventListenerList A generic storage facility for listeners.
ListDataEvent An event describing an update to items in a list.
TableColumnModelEvent An event which describes an update to a TableColumnModel
TableModelEvent An event describing a change to a TableModel.
WindowPaneEvent An event describing an update to the state of a WindowPane.
 

Package nextapp.echo.app.event Description

Provides core events, listener interfaces, and event management classes.

Related Documentation

For more information please see:
  • Echo Home Page
